channel.title: Starting Dev Team
channel.description: Ok so as the subject of this topic said, i am sarting a development team. These are the open spots: [Website Hoster] - Including space for a webclient [Server Tester] For Bugs ect [Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have [Advertiser] Advertises the server for more players. "Must be good" --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Those are the only open spots and here are the server details: Pretty much made from TorvaPkz so credit to him. Its a server working with 639. The Features for the server are as follows: Fully working pvp Overloads Summoning Chaotics torva Full Clan chat fullscreen/hd ------------------------------ There's more but i dont wanna spend a hour on here adding them. ---------------------------------------------------------------- If you wanna be a part of this you must have SKYPE and a mic. Here is the template for you to follow to enter to be a part of the dev team. ------------------ Name: Skype Name: What Role You Want: Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ): Why You Want This: Age: How Active You Are: --------------------- Apply and help with this wonderful server ( :

item.title: Starting Dev Team
item.dc:creator: @godalmighty godalmighty
item.description:
@godalmighty wrote:

Ok so as the subject of this topic said, i am sarting a development team.
These are the open spots:
[Website Hoster] - Including space for a webclient
[Server Tester] For Bugs ect
[Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have
[Advertiser] Advertises the server for more players. “Must be good”

Those are the only open spots and here are the server details:
Pretty much made from TorvaPkz so credit to him.
Its a server working with 639.
The Features for the server are as follows:
Fully working pvp
Overloads
Summoning
Chaotics
torva
Full Clan chat
fullscreen/hd

There’s more but i dont wanna spend a hour on here adding them.

If you wanna be a part of this you must have SKYPE and a mic.
Here is the template for you to follow to enter to be a part of the dev team.

Name:
Skype Name:
What Role You Want:
Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ):
Why You Want This:
Age:
How Active You Are:

Apply and help with this wonderful server ( :

Read full topic
